reviews.review_msg: this professor! so bad! never take his course for sure!

Guys, 100% honestly don't take his course. Not hard, it was DISASTER. When u done all the assignment perfectly and you 80% understand his lecture, u think u get A. Keep Dreaming! u probably end up with F. He gives exam just like IELTS Reading test. It doesn't matter how good ur math and formula understanding is. CUZ u can't even know what he asked!
He has bad intentions, wants you to do poorly and isn't here to teach

One of the best CHEM course I ever took. She is super nice and very helpful. Her lectures make your life way easier than you think. Just need to read the textbook if you missed the lecture, otherwise her lectures are way better than textbook. Highly recommend this instructor to those who hates CHEM. You will love this instructor.
Terrible Prof......Lack of teaching skill in the class....horrible exams and two midterm.....avoid this prof.....
She never finish the material on time!!!!
Much Better than that Garry Mund guy. His exams were easy to ace.  Great lecture note and clear accent.Highly recommended for those who are interested in major/minor Chem..  Five Star from me..
never stops teaching (reading from the powerpoint!). tries to teach as much as he can without solving questions. not clear. not doing enough useful examples.

She is a very nice prof.  very helpful,always willing to answer questions.exams are VERY easy,just read the book and go over the examples.Long-capa based on the examples in the book,not hard.the 1st midterm are  some terms and 2ed just some calculations,same in the testbook. Recommend course:P

This prof insists that all her students are stupid people. Lectures are pretty much a waste of time, keeps asking silly questions about common sense knowledge: "Do you guys know what a meter stick is?" I felt like a twelve year old.
Avoid at all costs. Was never there to guide you in what's needed. Exams are ridiculously long and structured horribly. Ta didn't do anything. Bad course overall.

You could be a chemistry whiz and still do bad in this course because the evaluations are inanely designed : you're given a fraction of the necessary time to complete multi-step stoichiometry problems, and also prevented from skipping a question and coming back to it later. The TA's are useless. 
If you want to lower your GPA, take this course.
